verses.verse: Then the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Go in<WH935> unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and tell<WH1696> <WH413> him, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> Let<WH853> my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me.
For <WH3588> if<WH518> thou<WH859> refuse<WH3986> to let them go,<WH7971> and wilt hold<WH2388> them still,<WH5750>

Behold, <WH2009> the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> is<WH1961> upon thy cattle<WH4735> which<WH834> is in the field,<WH7704> upon the horses,<WH5483> upon the asses,<WH2543> upon the camels,<WH1581> upon the oxen,<WH1241> and upon the sheep:<WH6629> there shall be a very<WH3966> grievous<WH3515> murrain.<WH1698>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall sever<WH6395> between<WH996> the cattle<WH4735> of Israel<WH3478> and the cattle<WH4735> of Egypt:<WH4714> and there shall nothing<WH3808> <WH1697> die<WH4191> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> that is the children's<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And the LORD<WH3068> appointed<WH7760> a set time,<WH4150> saying,<WH559> Tomorrow<WH4279> the LORD<WH3068> shall do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> in the land.<WH776>

And the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> <WH853> that<WH2088> thing<WH1697> on the morrow,<WH4480> <WH4283> and all<WH3605> the cattle<WH4735> of Egypt<WH4714> died:<WH4191> but of the cattle<WH4480> <WH4735> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> died<WH4191> not<WH3808> one.<WH259>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> sent,<WH7971> and, behold,<WH2009> there was not<WH3808> one<WH259> of the cattle<WH4480> <WH4735> of the Israelites<WH3478> dead.<WH4191> And the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh<WH6547> was hardened,<WH3513> and he did not<WH3808> let<WH853> the people<WH5971> go.<WH7971>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> and unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> Take<WH3947> to you handfuls<WH4393> <WH2651> of ashes<WH6368> of the furnace,<WH3536> and let Moses<WH4872> sprinkle<WH2236> it toward the heaven<WH8064> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh.<WH6547>

And it shall become<WH1961> small dust<WH80> in<WH5921> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and shall be<WH1961> a boil<WH7822> breaking forth<WH6524> with blains<WH76> upon<WH5921> man,<WH120> and upon<WH5921> beast,<WH929> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And they took<WH3947> <WH853> ashes<WH6368> of the furnace,<WH3536> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Pharaoh;<WH6547> and Moses<WH4872> sprinkled<WH2236> it up toward heaven;<WH8064> and it became<WH1961> a boil<WH7822> breaking forth<WH6524> with blains<WH76> upon man,<WH120> and upon beast.<WH929>

And the magicians<WH2748> could<WH3201> not<WH3808> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872> because of<WH4480> <WH6440> the boils;<WH7822> for<WH3588> the boil<WH7822> was<WH1961> upon the magicians,<WH2748> and upon all<WH3605> the Egyptians.<WH4714>

And the LORD<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> <WH853> the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and he hearkened<WH8085> not<WH3808> unto<WH413> them; as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses.<WH4872>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Rise up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> Let<WH853> my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me.

For <WH3588> I<WH589> will at this<WH2063> time<WH6471> send<WH7971> <WH853> all<WH3605> my plagues<WH4046> upon<WH413> thine heart,<WH3820> and upon thy servants,<WH5650> and upon thy people;<WH5971> that<WH5668> thou mayest know<WH3045> that<WH3588> there is none<WH369> like me<WH3644> in all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

For <WH3588> now<WH6258> I will stretch out<WH7971> <WH853> my hand,<WH3027> that I may smite<WH5221> thee and thy people<WH5971> with pestilence;<WH1698> and thou shalt be cut off<WH3582> from<WH4480> the earth.<WH776>

And in very deed<WH199> for<WH5668> this<WH2063> cause have I raised thee up,<WH5975> for<WH5668> to show<WH7200> in thee<WH853> my power;<WH3581> and that<WH4616> my name<WH8034> may be declared<WH5608> throughout all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
As yet<WH5750> exaltest thou thyself<WH5549> against my people,<WH5971> that thou wilt not<WH1115> let them go?<WH7971>

Behold, <WH2009> tomorrow<WH4279> about this time<WH6256> I will cause it to rain<WH4305> a very<WH3966> grievous<WH3515> hail,<WH1259> such<WH834> as<WH3644> hath not<WH3808> been<WH1961> in Egypt<WH4714> since<WH4480> <WH3117> the foundation<WH3245> thereof even until<WH5704> now.<WH6258>

Send <WH7971> therefore now,<WH6258> and gather<WH5756> <WH853> thy cattle,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> that<WH834> thou hast in the field;<WH7704> for upon every<WH3605> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> which<WH834> shall be found<WH4672> in the field,<WH7704> and shall not<WH3808> be brought<WH622> home,<WH1004> the hail<WH1259> shall come down<WH3381> upon<WH5921> them, and they shall die.<WH4191>

He that feared<WH3372> <WH853> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> among the servants<WH4480> <WH5650> of Pharaoh<WH6547> made<WH853> his servants<WH5650> and his cattle<WH4735> flee<WH5127> into<WH413> the houses: <WH1004>
And he that<WH834> regarded<WH7760> <WH3820> not<WH3808> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> left<WH5800> <WH853> his servants<WH5650> and his cattle<WH4735> in the field.<WH7704>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Stretch forth<WH5186> <WH853> thine hand<WH3027> toward<WH5921> heaven,<WH8064> that there may be<WH1961> hail<WH1259> in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> upon<WH5921> man,<WH120> and upon<WH5921> beast,<WH929> and upon<WH5921> every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> throughout the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And Moses<WH4872> stretched forth<WH5186> <WH853> his rod<WH4294> toward<WH5921> heaven:<WH8064> and the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> and hail,<WH1259> and the fire<WH784> ran along<WH1980> upon the ground;<WH776> and the LORD<WH3068> rained<WH4305> hail<WH1259> upon<WH5921> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

So there was<WH1961> hail,<WH1259> and fire<WH784> mingled<WH3947> with<WH8432> the hail,<WH1259> very<WH3966> grievous,<WH3515> such as<WH834> there was<WH1961> none<WH3808> like it<WH3644> in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> since<WH4480> <WH227> it became<WH1961> a nation.<WH1471>

And the hail<WH1259> smote<WH5221> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> was in the field,<WH7704> both man<WH4480> <WH120> and beast;<WH929> and the hail<WH1259> smote<WH5221> every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> and broke<WH7665> every<WH3605> tree<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>
Only <WH7535> in the land<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> where<WH834> <WH8033> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were, was<WH1961> there no<WH3808> hail.<WH1259>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> sent,<WH7971> and called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I have sinned<WH2398> this time:<WH6471> the LORD<WH3068> is righteous,<WH6662> and I<WH589> and my people<WH5971> are wicked.<WH7563>

Entreat <WH6279> <WH413> the LORD<WH3068> (for it is enough)<WH7227> that there be no<WH4480> <WH1961> more mighty<WH430> thunderings<WH6963> and hail;<WH1259> and I will let you go,<WH7971> and ye shall stay<WH5975> no<WH3808> longer.<WH3254>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, As soon as I am gone out<WH3318> of<WH853> the city,<WH5892> I will spread abroad<WH6566> <WH853> my hands<WH3709> unto<WH413> the LORD;<WH3068> and the thunder<WH6963> shall cease,<WH2308> neither<WH3808> shall there be<WH1961> any more<WH5750> hail;<WH1259> that<WH4616> thou mayest know<WH3045> how that<WH3588> the earth<WH776> is the LORD's.<WH3068>
But as for thee<WH859> and thy servants,<WH5650> I know<WH3045> that<WH3588> ye will not yet<WH2962> fear<WH3372> <WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> God.<WH430>
And the flax<WH6594> and the barley<WH8184> was smitten:<WH5221> for<WH3588> the barley<WH8184> was in the ear,<WH24> and the flax<WH6594> was bolled.<WH1392>
But the wheat<WH2406> and the rye<WH3698> were not<WH3808> smitten:<WH5221> for<WH3588> they<WH2007> were not grown up.<WH648>

And Moses<WH4872> went out<WH3318> of<WH853> the city<WH5892> from<WH4480> <WH5973> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and spread abroad<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> unto<WH413> the LORD:<WH3068> and the thunders<WH6963> and hail<WH1259> ceased,<WH2308> and the rain<WH4306> was not<WH3808> poured<WH5413> upon the earth.<WH776>

And when Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> the rain<WH4306> and the hail<WH1259> and the thunders<WH6963> were ceased,<WH2308> he sinned<WH2398> yet more,<WH3254> and hardened<WH3513> his heart,<WH3820> he<WH1931> and his servants.<WH5650>

And the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh<WH6547> was hardened,<WH2388> neither<WH3808> would he let<WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go;<WH7971> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>
